Warm wishes Sir,

The previous sessions with our senior, K Vishal Varma [CB.EN.U4CSE18334] was very helpful. He spent his great time, explaining us flowgramming. He had immense patience to explain the concepts and clear our doubts even if they were repetitive and simple. He made sure the basics of flowgramming were clear without any ambiguity. He also came up with a set of problems with different difficulty levels for better understanding of the students. We are thankful for having him in our classes and we hope this continues in the future.

Thank you

- CSE-D studentsâ€‹

Other Interests

I am very passionate and interested when it comes to teaching. I love to see the realisation in people's eyes when I help connect the dots with something they don't understand. Part of the reason why I chose to be a Teaching Assistant during my senior year in undergrad.

Teaching Assistant, Amrita School of Engineering

I taught Computational thinking and Problem Solving course to the freshman students. I received appreciation for the way I taught and being able to manage 2 classes of strength 60+.

CS Outreach Tutor, University of Texas at Dallas

I've carried on that same interest into my masters as well. I am currently tutoring Python and Java to a 9th grader as part of the outreach program.
